mapper.insert: insert into DW_ADMIN.TEST_PERSON (ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, LOGIN_NAME, FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, LOGIN_NAME, FLAG from DW_ADMIN.TEST_PERSON
